DOC.brief_summary: Women request pregnancy termination 14-16 week , would normally osmotic dilator insertion day procedure , would ask wanted participate . Participants would randomize two group : first , dilator insertion usual , second , mifepristone take day procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Mifepristone Versus Laminaria Insertion Cervical Preparation Prior Surgical Abortion 14-16 Weeks
